##: This file is a template. Fill the blanks and add or remove fields as necessary.
description: A Remake / Remaster of the original Super Mario World, in Godot. Adds new features / improvements!
notes: Requires an original SMW SNES ROM to play!
Configs are stored in "$env:APPDATA\SuperMarioWorldRemastered", and are not persisted by Scoop.
extract_dir: Super Mario World Remastered Plus v1.2

autoupdate.extract_dir: Super Mario World Remastered Plus v$version
